detail_desc: Shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in narrow-wale, patterned cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and back pockets.
Derby shoes with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Rubber soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Sandals with covered block heels, two straps at the front, a diagonal strap over the foot and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered appliqué on the chest and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in cotton jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Sandals in matt imitation leather. Adjustable foot straps with metal buckles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft printed jersey.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Long, crêpe-weave dress in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck. Decorative appliqués on the front, an opening and concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist and detachable belt with a covered buckle. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted blouse in airy linen with a sweetheart neckline and a small opening with ties at the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking at the back.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hooded jumper in fine-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the bottom, long sleeves and a layer of jersey at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bolero in fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and a shimmering button at the neckline.
Printed gym bag that can be worn as a backpack with a drawstring closure at the top and narrow contrasting colour shoulder straps. Size 35x45 cm.
Bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 6x15.5x24 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Patterned, fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer, stocking-stitched back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print pattern and a motif. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with frill details, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with narrow frill trims.
5-pocket jeans in supersoft stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Narrow, elasticated seam and a drawstring at the waist.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with sewn-in creases down the front and a zip and concealed button at the side. Skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Easy pull-on elasticated waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar and French front. Short sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable fabric shoulder strap. One zipped outer compartment and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm, height 12.5 cm, width 19 cm.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a ribbed waistband, fake fly and front and back pockets.

Hoodie knitted in soft, thermal fleece. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and a jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The hoodie is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Waist belt with decorative metal buckles at the front and elastication with a metal fastener. at the back.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with vertical seams at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed round neck and sewn-in pleats at the top. Concealed buttons at the back and cuffs and a seam at the waist  with a gently flared skirt.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a deep neckline front and back, gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Body in soft microfibre with lace details in a straight cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Partially covered in lace at the back, high cut legs, a lined gusset and a string back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, high-waisted, patterned bikini bottoms with an elastic waistband.
Fitted polo-neck top in a soft, fine rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and an open section at the top.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringe trims on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Short dress in softly draping viscose jersey with a boat neck, short cap sleeves and a smocked seam below the bust.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with a mesh and lace bodice, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Short, wide sleeves in lace, a seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Partly lined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Triangular scarves in an organic cotton weave with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs with plastic beads and metal pendants. Adjustable length 44-50 cm.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and long sleeves. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered-weave back, seamed neckline, a yoke with a flounce at the back, long, cuffed raglan sleeves and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved body in stretch jersey. V-neck with gathers at the front and press-studs at the crotch.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, flared legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Platform sandals in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with an adjustable ankle strap that has a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave, dropped shoulder seams and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layer hat in patterned jersey.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. One open chest pocket, two open front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
